{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3139563,"name":"Luke Fehrenbacher","username":"Luke.7657","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/l/df705f/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-02-04T16:16:02.247Z","cooked":"

We are trying to update our limelight 2+. When I go to flash it I select the file and when I go to select the device it says missing drivers and I click update and it freezes up. What am i doing wrong?

Have you downloaded the drivers from the limelight downloads page? I hope this helps!

Limelight for FRC

Downloads

Limelight Finder Tool Limelight Finder Tool 1.0.1 Bonjour (For stable networking on Windows): Bonjour Download USB Drivers USB Flash Driver Download Flash Tool (Etcher 1.14.3 required for LL3):  For Windows For MacOS 1.14.3 1.14.3  Etcher Flash...

After downloading the USB drivers (RPIBoot) and installing them, Close Etcher, then run the RPIBoot application. This should launch a CMD window that when the camera is connected should see the connected camera. If not then try a new cable or USB port. If it does see the camera leave it running and re-launch Etcher.
